name: DVD/CD UDF Tools (especially RRD Drive)
short_description: DVD/CD UDF disc drive tools, esp. for the Iomega RRD (aka Iomega REV) drive.  Usability patches for UDF mkfs and fsck.  Commentary for the lk MMC and UDF source code.  cvs co tarballs for firewalls that defeat CVS.  Links, FAQ's, troubleshooting hints.
